title: Demacia Icon
body: Just needed help claiming the icon, every time I tried to claim the icon, it tells me there's an error and refresh the page. I have refreshed the page more than 5 times, the problem still remains. Any solutions to this issue? Thank you.

replies.body: Sometimes the Demacia page can throw this error is it's not able to properly communicate with your League account to add the icon. Let's try clearing your browser cookies and be sure you have any extensions like adblockers turned off.

I have the same problem. I do not have any extensions on like adblock and I've tryed to log in and out of my acount many times. I do not know what to do. How do I turn of cookies if that is helping? I do not know how to ;_;

You can use our [Clearing Browser History FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see how you clear your cookies for whichever browser you might be using ^_^!

I do not know whats wrong. I clreared my cookies. I tryed restarting my computor. I tryed relogging my account. Im doing something wrong.

I wonder if it is another way to get the Icon, or anything that might help me. Thank you for your time to help me. I'm not that technical of me so I really apreachiat your help.

Hmmmm since you're still having trouble it sounds like there is something very specific going on. I'd like to get you some one on one help with our tech guys, so reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to go much more in depth!
Nothing worked, I tried the Hextech Repair Tool which seems to have fixed everything, but I still can't claim the Demacia icon.

Thank you! I will let you know if it works or if Im going to need more help :D
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Have you tried restarting the client and then trying again?
Sorry, I didn't know at the time that you couldn't get it through the client. Is there any other device you can use to get to the same page and redeem the icon?
